summary: Danes spending their summer holiday in an Austrian mountain hotel with a view over the Wolfgangsee (-lake).
cast: Dirch Passer|Susse Wold|Lone Hertz|Ove Sprogøe|Peter Malberg|Paul Hagen|Karl Stegger|Jan Priiskorn-Schmidt|Gyda Hansen|Elith Foss|Ole Monty|Bjørn Spiro|Jytte Abildstrøm|Agnes Rehni|Gunnar Bigum|Kirsten Hermansen|Helle Halding|Anne Lund-Christiansen|Odd Wolstad|Gert Bastian|Christen Blancke|Inga Reim|Jens Due|Aino Korva|Hans Rostrup|Ole Søgaard|Jørgen Weel
title: Sommer i Tyrol
